title: Disciplinary action
body: Due to your recent behaviours, we have decided to periodically remove your access to the following:    Eye(L)    Eye(R)    Thumb(L)    Thumb(R)    Pointer finger(L)    Pointer finger(R)    Middle finger(L)    Middle finger(R)    Ring finger(L)    Ring finger(R)    Pinkie finger(L)    Pinkie finger(R)    We hope that you will reflect upon your action during these time.

title: Welcome
body: Hello container no.260108, aka Cayden_003. welcome to the Cradle.    We understand that you may feel confused, scared, anxious, sad, angry, disgusted upon waking up, which is why we have included an introductory video.    We are happy to have you here at the Cradle, no.260109.
